title: Typographers' handwriting
content:
I hope this isn't a repost. Cameron Adams wrote to several famous type designers and asked them to submit samples of their handwriting. I found them entertaining and informative. Thanks  
link:  
 [http://www.themaninblue.com/articles/handwritten\_typographers/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023154828/http:/www.themaninblue.com/articles/handwritten_typographers/ "http://www.themaninblue.com/articles/handwritten\_typographers/")
author: CTAKAH
